title: Teacher Competency Assessment Design Using VR-Based Situational Judgment Tests

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of mathematics curriculum and educational theories, field experience (practicum or observation)
context.additional_context: A formative assessment-centered course simulating real educational scenarios in VR environments to evaluate teacher competencies, incorporating an automated scoring system using NLP technology.

learning_goals: Learners can describe specific solutions for educational dilemma scenarios presented in VR simulations across four competency dimensions: student-centeredness, problem-solving skills, emotional intelligence, and achievement motivation.
Learners can understand and apply the evaluation criteria of an NLP-based scoring system when writing open-ended SJT (Situational Judgment Test) responses.
Learners can improve their response content by over 70% based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
